8900.name: Ancient Spellbook: Cyclone
8900.description: Ancient Spellbook needed to learn Cyclone. Can be used by a Storm Screamer.

8901.name: Ancient Spellbook: Raging Waves
8901.description: Ancient Spellbook needed to learn Raging Waves. Used by Mystic Muses.

8909.name: Blueprint: Summon Swoop Cannon
8909.description: Blueprint needed to learn the Summon Swoop Cannon technique. Can be used by a Warsmith. Required level: 68

8910.name: Black Feather Mask
8910.description: Hair accessory containing a dark feather. It uses 2 hair accessory slots. This is an event item which cannot be exchanged or dropped.

8911.name: Black Half Mask (Event)
8911.description: A black-colored half mask. Event Item.

8912.name: Single Stem Flower
8912.description: Hair pin made in the shape of a flower.

8913.name: Butterfly Hairpin
8913.description: Hairpin in the shape of a butterfly. This is a female-only hair accessory.

8914.name: Luxurious Gold Circlet
8914.description: Luxurious Gold Circlet. It uses 2 hair accessory slots.

8915.name: Luxurious Silver Circlet
8915.description: Luxurious Silver Circlet. It uses 2 hair accessory slots.

8917.name: Goddess Circlet
8917.description: The goddess' circlet. This is a female-use hair accessory. It uses 2 hair accessory slots.

8918.name: Leather Cap
8918.description: A medieval-era hat made of leather. It uses 2 hair accessory slots.

8919.name: First Mate's Hat
8919.description: A hat befitting a favored member of Zaken's crew. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped.

8920.name: Angel Halo
8920.description: Hair accessory imbued with Holy energy. It uses 2 hair accessory slots.

8921.name: Demon Circlet
8921.description: Hair accessory possessed of dark energy. It uses 2 hair accessory slots.

8922.name: Pirate Hat
8922.description: Hat worn by pirates. It uses 2 hair accessory slots.

8923.name: Scar
8923.description: A scar. This is a male-only accessory.

8924.description: Boat Ticket from Primeval Isle to Rune.

8925.name: Boat Ticket: Rune to Primeval Isle.
8925.description: Boat Ticket from Rune to Primeval Isle.

8938.name: Damascus * Tallum Blade
8938.description: When enchanted, P. Atk. of a dualsword will increase more significantly than that of a one-handed or fist weapon. When enchanted to 4 or more, Atk. Spd. will increase by 8%. Inflicts additional damage to target during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

8939.name: Dominic's Mark
8939.description: Dominic's Mark. Used in carrying out a secret mission.

8940.name: Mark of the Future: Human
8940.description: Mark of the Future. Received from Grand Master Klaus Blackbird of Oren Castle Town.

8941.name: Mark of the Future: Dwarf
8941.description: Mark of the Future. Received from Warehouse Chief Alder of Schuttgart Castle Town.

8942.name: Mark of the Future: Elf
8942.description: Mark of the Future. Received from Magister Juris of Town of Giran.

8943.description: Mark of the Future. Received from Grand Master Oltran of Town of Aden.

8944.name: Mark of the Future: Orc
8944.description: Mark of the Future. Received from High Prefect Aklan of Goddard Castle Town.

8945.name: Spellbook: Celestial Shield
8945.description: Spellbook needed to learn Celestial Shield. Used by Bishops. Required level: 64

8946.name: Spellbook: Invocation
8946.description: Spellbook need to learn Invocation. Used by Bishops, Elders, and Shillien Elders. Required level: 56

8947.name: L2day - Rabbit Ears

8949.name: L2day - Fairy Antennae
8949.description: Cute antennae hair accessory with stars.

8950.name: L2day - Feathered Hat
8950.description: A fancy hat containing a feather. Uses 2 accessory slot spaces.

8951.name: L2day - Artisan's Goggles
8951.description: Big, round goggles to protect your eyes. Uses 2 accessory slot spaces.

8954.name: Blue Primeval Crystal
8954.description: Increases SP by 50000 when used. Can only be used by characters level 76 or higher. Blue Primeval Crystal

8955.name: Green Primeval Crystal
8955.description: Increases SP by 100000 when used. Can only be used by characters level 76 or higher. Blue Primeval Crystal

8956.name: Red Primeval Crystal
8956.description: Increases SP by 200000 when used. Can only be used by characters level 76 or higher. Blue Primeval Crystal

8957.name: Attack Orders
8957.description: Fantastic Scroll of Escape event item. A Warehouse Keeper can exchange these for Shadow Items appropriate to your level.

8958.name: Defence Orders
8958.description: Fantastic Scroll of Escape event item. A Warehouse Keeper can exchange these for Shadow Item appropriate to your level.

8959.name: Supply Orders
8959.description: Fantastic Scroll of Escape event item. A Warehouse Keeper can exchange these for consumables appropriate to your level.

8960.name: No Grade Shadow Armor Set Box
8960.description: One can receive a no-grade Shadow Armor set by double clicking. (Can be used when the weight gauge is below 60% and there are more than 20 empty inventory slots.) Item - Jade Treasure Box
